fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Pick 2 players. The next time the first player plays a card that targets someone else, they will instead target the second player.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
The next 3 times the first player plays a card that targets someone else, they will instead target the second player. 
 
*May pick the same 2 players. This will cause the initial target to bypass a Room restriction. Active until activated, unless the secondary target has died. Multiple Confound?!s will activate in the order they were applied. If the initial target targets the secondary target regardless not due to a Confound?!, the Confound effect will not be activated.*
